answers.answer: I also have gestational diabetes n am currently 29 weeks when did they check the baby's weight ?
The weight was recently checked 4 days ago on Monday. How are you copying with diabetes? Sometimes its hard for me to maintain my sugar normal.
Its kind of difficult I try to eat healthy but sometimes my sugar seems to be high I'm just worried about the birth my doctor told me theres risk when you have gestational diabetes
Yes big risks. Im afraid of that too! They told me that some babies are born obese and really big.  Im on meds to control my sugar.

I had gd. It was hard but I kept it in check. I had my sin at 38 weeks he was 6.13 lbs. Remember that they cannot tell you how much baby weighs sometimes they're correct and sometimes they can be as much as 2 lbs off. Don't let them scare you keep your diet in check you'll be fine but remember if you don't keep your diet in check then Abby could end up in nicu from a drop in blood sugar once the cord is cut. And a 9 lb baby feels the same as pushi g out a 6 lb baby trust me I've done both.
As for the transverse ask your doctor if they will try to turn baby at 37 weeks if he hasn't turned but you still have time don't worry
I had it my son was born at 38weeks 5days and weighted 5lbs and 15ounces
Its really easy to mAintain you just have to eat in portions and learn how to balance it.
I don't have it but i will tell you that the weights they tell you while your pregnant are just guesses and can and have been 2-3 lbs off. They are just guesses, don't stress to much about it.
Thank you soooo much ladies!!! I def. Feel much better!!!

question: Hi ladies I'm currently 34 weeks pregnant with my first and I have gestational diabetes. The doctor has told me that my baby is 6lbs!! But I've still got another month to go!!! He said that my baby could be born of around 9-10lbs. My baby is still breached and the doctor is afraid he won't fix it self because he almost doesn't have enough room in there.  Has any of you ever gotten diabetes with your pregnancy? If so when you had you baby how much did it weight? How about a breached baby?
title: gestational diabetes
